title: Bladetongue
info: The Bladetongue is a Hardmode autoswinging sword that is obtained by fishing in the Crimson biome. When it strikes an enemy, an Ichor stream is fired on an upwards arch, penetrating and damaging multiple enemies, bouncing against solid blocks, and applying the Ichor debuff.
